str.o: This module contains the RXML tag "insert cached-href". Useful when implementing e.g. RSS syndication.
States how often the data of an URL should be updated. In seconds, minutes, hours or days.

States how long data in the database can be considered fresh enough to display. In seconds, minutes, hours or days. As default this is 0, which means that this attribute is not used and that there are no restrictions on data freshness.
States how long unrequested data can exist in the database before being removed. In seconds, minutes, hours or days.
The timeout when fetching data from a server. In seconds, minutes, hours or days.
States how often the module will check if the database needs to be updated. In seconds, minutes, hours or days.
Maximum number of nested <tt><insert cached-href></tt>'s allowed. May be set to zero to disable the limit.
